sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you eat a <radical>rice paddy</radical> the size of the <radical>moon</radical>, your <kanji>stomach</kanji> is going to hurt. All the rice in a rice paddy the size of the moon is way too much rice for anyone to consume. If you do, your stomach is going to ache like crazy.
meaningInfo: Imagine having a whole rice paddy in your stomach. A rice paddy the size of the moon. Your stomach hurts a lot. You feel like you’re going to throw up.
readingMnemonic: From the sky, an eagle swoops down and flies right into your distended <kanji>stomach</kanji>. Bam! The <reading>ea</reading>gle (<ja>い</ja>) hits your stomach and you vomit up the entire moon sized rice paddy.
readingInfo: This eagle saw your stomach distress and decided to help by making you barf. Hear the screech of the eagle as it swoops down and rams you in the stomach.
